sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' function BtnRender({product, deleteProduct}) { const state = useContext(GlobalState) const [isAdmin] = state.userAPI.isAdmin const addCart = state.userAPI.addCart return (
{ isAdmin ? <> deleteProduct(product._id, product.images.public_id)}> Delete Edit : <> addCart(product)}> Buy View }
) } export default BtnRender
